main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 13 Jul 62 in the Dayton, Ohio area, where a bright light was observed moving from NW to NE.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 minutes., The light seemed to slow, stop, and then proceed in the same direction., The initial evaluation classified it as a probable balloon based on its behavior., The observer estimated the object to be about 50 feet in diameter., It was noted that the object appeared to have double red lights or windows and was flying at a lower altitude.
sighted object: a bright light moving in the sky
witness description: Details of the witness are not provided in the report.
